Name: Deepika E
Title: Some corrections for temple austerity
Review: I am firm believer of Kali Mata and I hail from Hyderabad, But I wish there is less of meat cutting & cooking and more of fresh vegetable cooking and offering. And I wish people chant Devi Aswadati stotram written by Kalidasa mahakavi when in the temple. I wish it rings in the temple.

Name: PurnimaJaay
Title: Peace
Review: Beautiful temple. Very peaceful and calm. Very large temple and expect to have crowd during the evening or on any special days. Plan ahead if you want to just pray. If not go along the crowd. No phones allowed. Buy turmeric and kumkum.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: considered powerful
Review: People believe that this temple is powerful .Visit this place in the morning or evening and prefer mornings and we feel peaceful and calm going here

Name: Ankitha L
Title: Beauty with Peace
Review: This is a very beautiful temple located at srisailam highway... beautifully built and ann excellent source of peace for mind ...one can take blessings from lordess maisamma by performing the Pooja with all the grandeur ...it's a must visit fr devotees ...

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Scared
Review: This temple is to bring out the inner peace by praying and reciting god's name , thereby promoting peace all around.

Name: G.GURU PILLAI
Title: BEWARE OF SHOPKEEPERS AND PANDITS
Review: Review of Gandi Maisamma TempleGoddess Maisamma is very powerful and u can feel the spiritual vibration .I have heard about this temple and felt the same.We went for car pooja where they charge Rs.100 for tokenPlease carry pooja materials along with u when u plan to do poojas .Shop keepers charge Rs,450 for one marigold garland and small white pumpkin, camphor,incense sticks and 5 nos lemon.u cant bargain with them as there wont be any options for u to  procure.After pooja pandits demand for Rs.200 to 500 .pandit assistants demands Rs.50-100.U cant leave the place unless u pay to trangenders & lambardis orelse they start curse u by throwing soil on your car.Though its a nice powerful temple,the circumstance wont allow you to pray peacefully.Be safe

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good
Review: We can visit this temple near  Srisailam highway  and presiding Deity is DURGA  DEVI consort of lord siva.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Bonal festival
Review: Bonal festival is the most important festival in Telangana state including in Hyderabad, where I was visited temple then so many people coming and do a festival.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of maisamma teml
Review: The famous temple in asif nagar and we can get blessing of god maisamma thalli, very famous god for th

Name: ravirjy
Title: Small Temple but Powerful
Review: It is very popular temple in hyderabad. Many devotees visit this place at the time of Batukamma festival in telangana

Name: raja p
Title: powerful goddess
Review: this is very popular goddess in telangana state.this is in chilukuru balaji temple road.temple is small.but very powerful temple.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: most sacred and powerful temple....
Review: gand misamma gudi is most powerful temple and plz visit here on bonallu time and you feel astonished.... ist on outer ring road and 5 kms and bit small gudi....

Name: Sai P
Title: Small but a nice temple
Review: Its a nice temple near to outer ring road. Its about 5 kms from the police academy/outer ring road circle. Its on the way from mehdipatnam to chilukur balaji temple. This was under military survilience as this is built in miitary area of training of drivers very long back. But because of frequency of devotees, military could not deny them. Its a small temple but powerful goddess. Most devotees give away goats & hens to kalimata.

Name: Usha65
Title: Good but neglected temple
Review: While going to Umamaheswaram in  in Mahabubnagar District, on the way we visited this  temple  which is  very different than the other temples. This temple is in the Maisigandi village in Ammanagal mandal in Mahabobnagar district of Telangana state. Those who are visiting Srisailam can visit this temple on their way and it is about 70 km from Hyderabad. From Hyderabad one can go in the morning and return by evening. The temple is big with a giant (about 20 feet ht) idole and the Gopuram is also huge and different from all south Indian temples; Maa kaali is worshiped here.There are many small idols inside the temple and major attraction of this temple is the huge snake mound in the center of the inner side of the temple. However, it is not maintained very well and can see lot of dirt around. It is a very good temple with a very good idol and can not be missed.
